Description:
PaliRoots is seeking a Marketing Manager to join our growing team. The Senior Manager will lead and drive global campaigns to generate awareness and demand for our growing apparel and accessory brand. The successful individual will specifically lead the strategy, planning, management, deployment, and promotion of compelling customer-centric content marketing campaigns that drive new customer acquisition, deepen engagement, and motivate customers to act. CREATIVITY IS OUR SUPERPOWER! ⚡ PaliRoots is at its best when every member of our team feels respected, included, and heard—when everyone can show up as themselves and do their best work every day. We value and share an infinite range of ideas and voices that evolve and broaden our perspectives with a reach that extends into all our brands, partners, and suppliers.Duties + Roles:Managing a marketing department to complete compelling & successful projects and campaigns by brainstorming details for projects and promotions.
Manage team from other departments to complete task to launch successful campaigns
Conduct weekly entire team with all marketing departments
Contributing to PaliRoots strategic vision by offering creative marketing solutions
Tracking finished campaigns to evaluate and review successes and failures
Organizing events as a part of particular campaigns
Communicating with a marketing team to implement a budget
Recruiting, hiring and training staff members within their department
Researching and analyzing marketing trends to plan campaigns strategically
Building brand awareness through their department's marketing efforts
Communicating with other directors to deliver the best possible campaigns
Attaining updated technical knowledge to make informed decisions
Changing Website Banners according to the sale or promo.Skills
